title: Playlists are empty
content: All my playlists are empty.  The song files are all there, but the playlists all show 0 songs in them.  I've tried everything I can find online, including clearing the cache and storage in the "Media Storage" system app, but the problem persists.  I've also tried removing all my audio files and re-loading them onto the device, but the problem persists.  Also, there isn't a ".nomedia" file in the music directory.
